verses.text: \w Against|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Nabo, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded: Cariathaim \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: \w the|strong="H0559"\w* strong city \w is|strong="H3068"\w* confounded \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath trembled.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* rejoicing \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Hesebon: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*. Come, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w being|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H1571"\w* shalt thou \w in|strong="H5921"\w* silence hold thy peace, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* thee.

\w A|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w crying|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H6963"\w* Oronaim: waste, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* destroyed: \w proclaim|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* \w for|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H8085"\w* \w little|strong="H6810"\w* \w ones|strong="H6810"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ascent|strong="H4608"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* Luith shall \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mourner \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H8085"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w descent|strong="H4174"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* Oronaim \w the|strong="H3588"\w* enemies \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* howling \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

\w Flee|strong="H5127"\w*, \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* heath \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0982"\w* thy bulwarks, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H0982"\w* thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, thou \w also|strong="H1571"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Chamos \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* captivity, \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spoiler \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w plains|strong="H4334"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w flower|strong="H6731"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w flower|strong="H6731"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w uninhabited|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* doth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H7423"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* withholdeth \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* hath \w been|strong="H8252"\w* fruitful \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath rested \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* lees: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H8252"\w* poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* captivity: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w taste|strong="H2940"\w* hath \w remained|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* scent \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w changed|strong="H4171"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* men \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* order \w and|strong="H0935"\w* overturn \w his|strong="H3068"\w* bottles, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w down|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* empty \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* break \w their|strong="H3068"\w* bottles \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H0935"\w* another.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Chamos, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* trusted.

\w How|strong="H0349"\w* do \w you|strong="H0376"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* stout \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*?

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w her|strong="H3381"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H3381"\w* \w choice|strong="H0970"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*: saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* thereof shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w swiftly|strong="H3966"\w*.

Comfort \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*?

\w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*, O \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* spoiler \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* thee, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* thy bulwarks.

\w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* look \w out|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* habitation \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*: \w inquire|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* fleeth: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* hath \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w Is|strong="H4100"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w*?

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* confounded, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* overthrown: \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H4124"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* ye \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5046"\w* Amen, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* wasted.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Helon, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Jasa, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mephaath|strong="H4158"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1769"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, \w and|strong="H1769"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Nabo, \w and|strong="H1769"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Deblathaim,
\w And|strong="H7156"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Cariathaim, \w and|strong="H7156"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Bethgamul, \w and|strong="H7156"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Bethmaon,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Carioth, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Bosra: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w or|strong="H0776"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5002"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w off|strong="H1438"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H1431"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w lifted|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* dash \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w vomit|strong="H6892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* derision.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* derision unto thee: \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* thou hadst \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w* amongst \w thieves|strong="H1590"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w*, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1697"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* led \w away|strong="H5110"\w* captive.

\w Leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w you|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* ye \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* maketh \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w nest|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* hole \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* highest \w place|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w We|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H1343"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w he|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w proud|strong="H1343"\w*: \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w haughtiness|strong="H7312"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* arrogancy, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w loftiness|strong="H7312"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* boasting, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* strength thereof \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w it|strong="H3651"\w* endeavoured \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* able.
